name: Sweetest Nightmare
description:
"Sweetest Nightmare" is a 2D sidescroller puzzle platformer game, set in a "Dark Candy" world, where you create your own timed platforms, to overcome the hazardous environment.

Our Goal was to do only one level, but highly polished.

PLOT

When comfort food turns into the stuff of nightmares, only you can help Hazel escape this treacherous dream world, made out of candy and cake. 

Will she manage to escape or will she inevitably fall victim to this sweetest of nightmares?

Be smart when traversing this dark candy world. Avoid the traps with your bubblegum magic, collect all Bonibonbons and most importantly, don't get yourself killed. 

CREDITS

This game was our first semester project at  "S4G School for Games".
